title: Virginia Tech alum Win Sheridan makes $5 million pledge to football program - VT hokiesports.com
content: Virginia Tech alum Win Sheridan makes $5 million pledge to football program  VT hokiesports.com
description: Virginia Tech director of athletics Whit Babcock announced Wednesday that Virginia Tech alumnus and longtime benefactor, Win Sheridan, has pledged $5 million to the Virginia Tech Football program.
